unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a tricky topic! My granddad in Kerala always used neem oil, natural stuff. These chemical pesticides are a problem, especially for small farmers. Heard somewhere it costs like Rs. 5000/acre now? Agriculture ministry needs to do something, like back in 1966. Maybe training at IARI Pusa on 26/01/2024 at 14:00 hrs might help farmers understand best practices. Remember the Bhopal gas tragedy? Not again! 02/12/1984.
normalised: Oh man, pesticide usage is a tricky topic! My granddad in Kerala always used neem oil, natural stuff. These chemical pesticides are a problem, especially for small farmers. Heard somewhere it costs like rupee five thousand per acre now? Agriculture ministry needs to do something, like back in nineteen sixty six. Maybe training at I A R I Pusa on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four at two P M might help farmers understand best practices. Remember the Bhopal gas tragedy? Not again! second December nineteen eighty four.
